Preparation.Step: Prepare cornbread according to box directions, let cool slightly before assembling and serving.

50 mins
Add water and trivet to bottom of Instant Pot. Generously season pork butt, place on trivet, and pour bbq sauce over the top of the pork. Cook for 40 minutes, with a 10 minute natural release.

10 mins
Meanwhile, drain the corn and heat a pan over medium-high heat. Add the corn, with no oil or butter, and cook until charred. Mix and continue to cook until most of the corn is nicely charred.

10 mins
For the hollandaise, melt the butter in a container that you can easily pour from. Add egg yolks, lemon juice, and optional seasonings to blender. Blend on high, and slowly pour the melted butter in a steady stream while blending. Continue blending until sauce fully comes together, season to taste with salt and pepper.

5 mins
When pork is done, remove from Instant Pot and shred. Set Instant Pot to saute mode, to reduce the bbq sauce in the bottom as much as you can.

4 mins
Cook the eggs in your preferred style. I poach them for 4 minutes.

2 mins
Divide cornbread into 4 pieces, top each with pulled pork, egg, hollandaise, charred corn, and chopped cilantro. Drizzle with reduce bbq sauce from the Instant Pot. Serve and enjoy.

5 mins
Mix together honey, sriracha, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl. Warm if necessary in microwave.

20 mins
optional
Place salmon fillets in bowl. Marinate for 10-20 minutes.
Preheat air fryer to 390°F.

12 mins
Place fillets in air fryer and drizzle extra sauce over the top. Fry for 12 minutes. Optionally place a bit of aluminum foil on the bottom to prevent the sauce from dripping off.
Garnish with sesame seeds, and serve over rice, salad greens, or any other of your favorite sides.

5 mins
Add cocoa powder, malt powder, and sugar to a medium bowl. Stir to remove any clumps.

5 mins
Pour in milk, heavy cream, and vanilla. Whisk together until sugar mixture is completely dissolved.

30 mins
Chill in refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.

25 mins
Pour into ice cream machine and mix according to machine instructions.

4 hrs
optional
Ice cream will be soft serve consistency. Transfer to a shallow container and freeze for at least 4 hours for ice cream consistency.

Ingredients.Name: c. à thé herbes de Provence
paquet (450 g) tofu ferme coupé en cubes
c. à soupe cognac, ou vinaigre de cidre
c. à soupe moutarde à l’ancienne
c. à soupe moutarde de Dijon

Preparation.Step:
35 mins
Mélanger la fécule de maïs, la levure alimentaire, la sauge, les herbes de Provence
et le sel.
Ajouter les cubes de tofu et mélanger afin de les enrober.
Déposer le tofu au four (375 °F) sur une plaque de cuisson huilée. Cuire 20 minutes en retournant à mi-cuisson.
Dans une casserole, à feu moyen, faire revenir les échalotes françaises dans l’huile 3 minutes.
Ajouter le cognac et poursuivre la cuisson 2 minutes à feu vif.
Ajouter le reste des ingrédients de la sauce, réduire le feu et laisser mijoter 5 minutes.
Ajouter le tofu, bien mélanger
*Servir avec de la purée de pommes de terre et légumes au four (ex : brocolis)

30 secs
Take butter from fridge and microwave 30 seconds to soften.
Preheat oven to convection 375°F.

1 min
Place sugar, brown sugar, margarine, eggs, and vanilla in mixer bowl. Mix for about 1 minute.

2 mins
Gradually add baking soda, salt and flour to sugar mixture and mix about 2 minutes.

2 mins
Add chocolate chips, almonds, and peanut butter chips, English toffee bits until mixed.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased baking sheets.

11 mins
Bake at 375 degrees for 11 minutes.

30 mins
Let cool completely on pan.
Set up your ice cream machine: freeze bowl attachment for at least 15 hours before starting.

1 min
Beat egg yolks in a large mixing bowl and set aside.

10 mins
In a medium stock pot, combine the milk, whipping cream, sugar, and salt. Heat and stir the mixture until gently simmering. Transfer to a measuring cup and gradually pour into the egg yolks, whisking constantly. Be careful not to heat the eggs too quickly, or they will scramble.

15 mins
Return the entire mixture to the pan, then heat over medium low until 194°F, stirring constantly with a rubber spatula to prevent it from burning and clumping. Do not let it come to a boil, as this will curdle the mixture.
Stir in the vanilla extract.

8 hrs
Pour the mixture into a bowl, cover with a layer of clingwrap directly on top of the custard, and refrigerate for at least 8 hours and up to 24.

8 mins
In a small saucepan, combine the blueberries, sugar, and lemon juice. Cook over medium-low heat until the sugar and blueberries form a liquid sauce. Continue to stir and cook until it has reduced by half and runs off of a spoon in thick drops.

1 min
Pour the sauce through a sieve into a bowl, pressing through with a spatula to extract as much of the juice and fruit from the skins as possible. Discard the skins and chill the sauce until cold.

25 mins
Once the custard is chilled, start the mixer and pour the custard in. Churn for 25 minutes until it reaches soft serve consistency.

5 mins
Transfer ice cream to a shallow container, and pour blueberry sauce over top. Swirl together a few times, but not completely.

4 hrs
Freeze until hard, about 2-4 hours.

Ingredients.Name: chopped walnuts, can substitute chocolate chips optional

Preparation.Step: Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream sugar and margarine or butter. Beat the egg slightly and mix into the creamed mixture with the bananas. Mix in sifted ingredients until just combined. Stir in milk and nuts.
Spread batter into greased and floured 9.5 inch loaf pan.

1 hr
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until top is brown and cracks along the top.

Ingredients.Name: Starbucks Italian roast VIA instant coffee, 5 packets

Preparation.Step: Make sure the freezer bowl is in the freezer for a minimum of 15 hours.

5 mins
Mix milk and sugar until the sugar is dissolved. Add the instant coffee, vanilla extract, and heavy cream (and optionally vodka/rum). Mix everything together thoroughly.

30 mins
Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 30 minutes.

25 mins
Start the mixer, add the ice cream mixture, and mix for 25-30 minutes. Add the toffee bits and chocolate chips in the last 5 minutes.

4 hrs
optional
The ice cream will be at a soft serve consistency. To solidify, scoop the ice cream into a shallow container, cover, and place in the freezer for 4 hours.

10 mins
Stir together water, canola oil and 1 tablespoon melted unsalted butter in a liquid measuring cup. Sprinkle in the yeast; let it sit a few minutes until it foams.
Whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar and 2 teaspoons sea salt and in a bowl, then add the yeast mixture, stirring, to form a wet dough.

1 hr
Lightly flour a countertop; turn out the dough and knead for 5 to 8 minutes, adding flour or water as needed. The dough should be smooth and elastic. Transfer to an oiled bowl and cover with plastic wrap; let it sit in a warm place for about an hour or until doubled.
Use a fork to combine scallions, chili oil and 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt in a bowl to 8 tablespoons room-temperature unsalted butter. Add salt as needed. Set aside.
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Punch down the dough; return it to the floured countertop. Cut it into four equal portions; shape each into a ball.

10 mins
Roll out one ball at a time to 1/8-inch thick. Melt 1 tablespoon unsalted butter and brush dough. Sprinkle with scallions. Fold the left one-third of the dough over into the center, and repeat with the right side, business-letter-style. Brush with more melted butter. Fold the bottom third up to the center and the top down. Dust with flour and roll out to a 6-inch round

8 mins
Heat 1/2 tablespoon canola oil in an ovenproof skillet over medium heat. Cook one round at a time (adding new oil each time) until deeply browned on each side, 2 to 3 minutes per side, then bake for about 5 minutes, or until the bread puffs slightly and feels firm in the center.
Transfer to a cutting board and cover with a clean dish towel. Use your hands to gently crush it from the outside to separate the layers. Serve with the scallion-chili butter.

Recipes.name: Pumpkin Soup for Sara - Recipe in Progress

Ingredients.Name: ribs celery, leaves removed, finely chopped
crisp apple, such as McIntosh or Granny Smith, finely chopped

Preparation.Step:
30 mins
Heat a medium soup pot over medium to medium high heat. Add the oil and melt the butter. Add bay, celery, and onion. Season the veggies with salt and pepper. Cook 6 or 7 minutes, until tender. Add flour, poultry seasoning, hot sauce, and miso to taste, then cook flour a minute. Whisk in chicken stock and bring liquid to a bubble. Whisk in pumpkin in large spoonfuls to incorporate it into the broth. Simmer soup 10 minutes to thicken a bit then add in cream and nutmeg. Reduce heat to low and keep warm until ready to serve.

15 mins
While soup cooks, assemble the relish: combine apple, onion, lemon juice, cranberries, chili powder, honey and cinnamon.

5 mins
Adjust seasonings in soup and relish and serve soup in shallow bowls with a few spoonfuls of relish.
Cook pasta according to box directions. When finished, reserve 1/2 cup of pasta water.

3 mins
In a medium pan, melt butter over medium heat. Saute garlic until golden and fragrant.

2 mins
Add flour, basil, and oregano and stir in so there are no clumps. Cook down until there's no foaming and the flour starts to take on some color.

5 mins
Add milk and bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer, while continuing to stir. Cook until slightly reduced.

5 mins
Gradually stir in mozzarella and parmesan until fully combined, and continue cooking until everything is melded together.

5 mins
Stir in reserved pasta water slow, one splash at a time, until desired consistency is achieved. Discard any remaining pasta water.
Add pasta and mix to completely coat, and season with salt and pepper.

Ingredients.Name: (1 1/2 sticks) butter, plus more for pan

Preparation.Step:
40 mins
Preheat oven to 350° and grease a large baking dish with butter. Peel and core apples then cut each apple into eighths.
Separate crescent dough into triangles. Starting at the wider end, roll one apple slice up in a crescent triangle. Repeat with remaining apple slices and crescents. Place into prepared pan.
In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt together. Pour mixture over apples.
Pour soda around edge of pan, trying to avoid pouring on top of dumplings. Bake dumplings until golden, 30 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream and spoon sauce from pan over dumplings.
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Whisk together eggs, cream, and spices.
Stir in beef, cheddar, and spinach.
Roll open dough and cut into 4” square sections.
Line a lightly oiled muffin tin with one square of puff pastry dough.
Evenly distribute egg mix between each muffin section.

25 mins
Bake on the middle rack for 25-30 minutes, or until egg is set in the center.
Let cool slightly before serving.

Ingredients.Name: Ripe bananas, Save half banana for slices on the top

Preparation.Step:
15 mins
Blend wet ingredients until they form a thick paste.

10 mins
Sift dry ingredients together. Fold them in to wet bowl, without over-mixing.

5 mins
Pour batter into loaf pan lined with parchment paper. Top with reserved banana slices.

45 mins
Bake at 350°.

15 mins
Take pan out, cover with foil, put back into the oven until toothpick comes out clean.

10 mins
Throw all ingredients in a food processor and run until creamy, or mash everything with a potato masher until it is the consistency you want. Serve warm, room temperature, or cold.

Ingredients.Name: 3 oz packs driec ramen noodles, or make your own

Preparation.Step:
32 mins
optional
Cook the chicken: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Season the chicken generously with salt and pepper. Melt the butter in a large oven-safe skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken, skin-side down, and cook until the skin is golden brown and releases easily from the pan, about 5-7 minutes. Flip the chicken over and cook for another 4-5 minutes, until golden. Transfer the skillet to the oven and roast for 15-20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Remove from the oven, transfer the chicken to a plate and cover with foil until ready to serve.

15 mins
Make the ramen broth: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat, until shimmering. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for a few minutes until softened. Add the soy sauce and mirin, and stir to combine. Cook for another minute. Add the stock, cover, and bring to boil. Remove the lid, and let simmer uncovered for 5 minutes, then add the dried mushrooms. Simmer gently for another 10 minutes, and season with salt, to taste.

8 mins
Make the soft-boiled eggs: Fill a pot with enough water to cover the eggs, and bring to a boil. Gently lower the eggs (still cold from the fridge) into the boiling water, and let simmer for 7 minutes (for a slightly-runny yoke) or 8 minutes (for a soft, but set-up yoke).

5 mins
Meanwhile, fill a large bowl with ice water. When the timer finishes, transfer the eggs to the ice bath to stop the cooking process. Wait at least 5 minutes, or until cool enough to handle, then carefully peel away the shell and slice in half, lengthwise. Set aside until ready to serve.

3 mins
Assemble the ramen bowls: Meanwhile, chop the scallions and jalapeño (if using). Slice the chicken into thin pieces. Set aside. When the eggs finish cooking, add the ramen noodles to the boiling water. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until soft, then divide the noodles into two large bowls. Add the sliced chicken and the ramen broth. Top with the fresh scallions, jalapeño and the soft boiled egg. Serve immediately.

Recipes.name: Somewhere Between Crepes, Pancakes and Heaven: Finish Pancakes

Preparation.Step: in a large bowl, whisk together eggs, milk and vanilla extract
mix in sugar and salt
gradually whisk in 3 cups flower

30 mins
let rest at room temp for 30 minutes
Place large nonstick skillet on the stove over medium heat
add a knob of butter and let it foam
add half-ladle of the thin batter in an even, circular motion, swirling into a large flat circle.
let it brown for 1-2 minutes, flip, brown on the other side for 30 seconds or so
remove from pan, set aside on a large plate
continue, adding butter as needed until batter is gone.

Ingredients.Name: 6-oz. skin-on salmon fillets, pin bones removed, patted dry

Preparation.Step: Prepare a grill/pan for medium heat. Rub salmon with 2 Tbsp. olive oil; season both sides with salt.

5 mins
Cut ends off lemon and discard. Place lemon upright and slice off outer lobes in 4 sections, leaving a square-shaped core and seeds behind. Finely chop lobes (flesh, pith, and all) and transfer to a small bowl (you should have about ⅓ cup). Squeeze out juice from core over bowl. Add shallot, sesame seeds, honey, sesame oil, and remaining ⅓ cup olive oil; season with salt and lots of pepper. Toss to combine.

8 mins
Place salmon on grill/pan skin side down. Cover grill/pan and cook, skin side down the entire time, until skin is lightly charred and fish is opaque, 6–8 minutes. Transfer salmon to a plate and let cool slightly. (If using stove and pan, cover pan with top for same affect)
Divide salmon among plates. Top with basil. Spoon lemon-sesame sauce over.
Add everything to a food processor or blender and run until it's nice and creamy.

30 mins
Let it sit for 30 minutes in the fridge before serving.

Ingredients.Name: Persian limes, regular limes work too

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Cook Chana Dal according to directions on package or cover with two inches of water in a pot and bring to a boil. Once it comes to a boil, reduce it to a low simmer for 10 minutes. (Rinse after cooking, to remove excess starch)
Dice yellow onion and put in to pot with oil. They're pretty soft, they're brown around the edges.

We have one pound of chuck cut to about three quarter inch, one inch pieces. I'm going to season this with salt. Give that a toss. If you could do this early, as in an hour before, that's great, just to really season the meat.

5 mins
Add one pound of the chuck and toss this. Probably about anywhere from four to six minutes on medium high.

30 secs
Add 1 tsp ground tumeric, 3/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 teaspoon pepper. Let that go for just like 30 seconds.

2 mins
Add a quarter cup of tomato paste and cook down for about two minutes, or until the tomato paste is starting to stick to the bottom of the pot.

Add dried limes (pierce with knife to create little slits, so that their flavor can be extracted in the stew) and Chana Dal, then add four cups of water. Then bring pot to a boil while scraping the bottom of the pot.

Once stew comes to a boil, reduce it to a simmer, like medium-low. Then take the back of the wooden spoon and crush the Persian Limes slightly against sides of the pot. Slightly cover with lid, so some steam can escape and it can reduce until thickened.

Ingredients.Name: olive oil (extra virgin), NOT canola, vegetable, etc.

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Mix active dry yeast and water in a measuring cup or small bowl, and let it sit for 10 minutes.
Add honey to yeast-water mixture.
In a large bowl add all-purpose flour and salt, mix.

10 mins
Pour water mixture into bowl with flour, mix until just combined, should be pretty wet. Then add olive oil to dough and knead/combine in bowl with hands.

12 hrs
Cover bowl tightly (lid or plastic wrap) and let it sit at in room temperature for 12 hrs - 14 hrs (min 8 hrs, max 24 hrs) or until dough doubles in size.
*For room temperature/warm put in an OFF oven with oven light on.

35 mins
Using a cookie sheet or sheet pan, pour 2 - 3 tbsp and spread on pan. Then slowly and gently pour/move dough onto sheet pan. Gently, stretch (massage out) dough with fingers until dough almost fits entire pan, if dough not stretching enough let it sit for 15 mins then stretch again. Let it rest room temperature in sheet pan, uncovered for about 30 mins.
While waiting, make Brine, mix water and salt in bowl.

Once dough has rested, pour a little bit of olive oil on hands and 'massage' dough (imagine using all fingers to press piano keys quickly), this should result in little craters or dimples in the dough.

10 mins
Pour Brine over top of dough. Then if wanted drizzle a little more olive oil over top of dough.
Bake in oven for 25 minutes at 450°F (if wanted halfway through baking , sprinkle sea salt over dough)

Ingredients.Name: large bunch Tuscan kale, ribs and stems removed
farro pasta or whole wheat pasta
Parmesan, finely grated, plus more for serving

Preparation.Step:
20 mins
Step 1
Cook kale leaves in a large pot of boiling salted water until bright green and wilted, about 30 seconds. Transfer to a rimmed baking sheet with tongs; keep water boiling. Let kale cool slightly; wring out excess water with your hands.
Step 2
Cook pasta in pot of boiling water, stirring occasionally, until al dente.
Step 3
Blend nuts, oil, garlic, and ⅓ cup water in a blender or food processor until very smooth. Add kale and 1 oz. Parmesan. Purée, adding water 1 Tbsp. at a time as needed, until smooth. Transfer pesto to a large bowl.
Step 4
Using tongs, transfer pasta to bowl with pesto; add butter and ⅓ cup pasta cooking liquid. Toss, adding more pasta cooking liquid by the tablespoonful if needed, until sauce coats pasta. Divide among bowls; top with more Parmesan and a few grinds of pepper.

Ingredients.Name: recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie

Preparation.Step:
1 hr, 10 mins
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

In a saucepan, whisk together 2 cups sugar, cocoa and flour. Blend in evaporated milk and vanilla. Beat egg yolks, and stir into pan. Add the butter or margarine. Heat, stirring constantly just until butter is melted. Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.
Bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until pie is not "wobbly" when shaken.
Beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating constantly, until stiff peaks form. Spread meringue on pie.
Return pie to oven, and bake until meringue is golden.

Ingredients.Name: Can of peas with juice optional

Preparation.Step:
2 hrs
Cook chicken, beef, bones, onions, and seasonings.

30 mins
Add cabbage and celery.

30 mins
Add carrots, frozen veggies, and bouillon.

30 mins
Add potatoes, tomatoes, lemon juice, peas.

Ingredients.Name: cayenne powder, use to desired spice optional

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Whisk all dry ingredients together, taking care to ensure there are no lumps
Use immediately or store in air-tight container up to 6 months

Recipes.name: Vegetable-Noodle Soup w/ Ginger Miso Broth

Ingredients.Name: lime juice, dash toasted sesame oil, siracha

Preparation.Step:
1 min
To make the broth, peel the ginger by scraping the skin off with a spoon. Cut the ginger into 1/4-inch-thick slices. Thickly slice the garlic too and chop the carrot into big chunks. Grab a medium pot and turn the heat on to medium. Once the pot is hot, add the ginger and carrot chunks and let them go on the bottom of the pot with no oil or anything. Keep stirring them around off and on for 2 minutes. It's cool if they stick, just rip them off with the spoon and keep going. Now add the garlc and do the same for another minute. Pour in the broth or water, add the cilantro, and let that veggie hot tub simmer for 15 minutes.
While the broth is doing its thing, cook the noodles, according to the package diractions.

When the broth has simmered 15 minutes, pull out all the ginger, garlic, carrot, and cilantro with a slotted spoon. Add the soy sauce and broccoli and simmer for a minute or two until the broccoli has lost its raw edge, then turn off the heat. Scoop up 1/2 cup of the broth and dissolve the miso paste in it, stirring until the chunks are gone. Pour that back in the pot and give it all a taste.

To assemble, grab a handful of the noodles and place them at the bottom of a bowl. Add a handful of the carrots, snow peas, and green onion. Ladle the hot broth and broccoli bits over and let it sit for a minute as the carrots and snow peas soften. Top with some more of the green onions and some of your favorite condiments.

Ingredients.Name: Quorn Chik'n tenders, or any fake chicken bites
No- chicken Better than Bouillon optional

Preparation.Step: Add water to nutritional yeast. Set aside.

20 mins
Saute onions and butter until soft, then add chik'n. Saute until edges are brown.

5 mins
Add miso and saute until fragrant.

30 mins
Add spices, cabbage, celery, and carrots.

30 mins
Add rutabaga, potatoes, tomatoes, water, bouillon. Pour in nutritional yeast water but not the sediment.
Whisk corn starch with a little hot water, then add to pot.

10 mins
Add frozen veggies, salt, and pepper. After 10 minutes, season to taste.

10 mins
Sift the flour with baking soda, baking powder, and salt.

8 mins
Separately cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy.

10 mins
Add eggs and vanilla to creamed sugar and mix until combined, then add peanut butter and mix again.

15 mins
Add the flour in small batches and mix until uniform. Add any extras and mix.

1 hr
Chill dough
Preheat oven to 350°F and dark baking sheet. If lighter baking sheet, bake at 375°.

10 mins
Use .25 oz scoop and flatten cookies with a fork.

10 mins
Bake!
Take out of the oven. If using, push reeses pieces into the tops.

20 mins
Let sit for 10 minutes, then move to wire rack for 10 minutes.

Ingredients.Name: Water, Cold (or as much as needed)

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Sanitize your measuring cup, thermometer, rice / mixing paddle & final storage container.

25 mins
Combine cooked rice ingredients in the instant pot, seal the valve and select the rice setting. Turn off the keep warm option. Let valve release naturally once complete.
Open instant pot and turn on the warm function.

5 mins
Add the hot water to the cooked rice and stir. Place thermometer in the mixture and add cold water until the temperature reaches ~140 degrees (minimum 125 degrees, maximum 150 degrees). Make sure all the rice is submerged. Discard any remaining cold water.

Stir in the Koji until evenly mixed. Place 2-3 towels over the instant pot to prevent overheating while preventing debris from entering. You may choose to cover it with a pot lid on top of the towels but do NOT close with the instant pot lid as the temperature may rise too much.

10 hrs
Allow to ferment for 8-10 hours, checking temperature occasionally for the first couple of hours. If the rice absorbs enough water that you need to add more, mix hot and cold water and measure the temperature before adding it to the instant pot.

10 mins
Take the pot out of the instant pot and place it in a bowl of ice water to bring the temperature down and stop the fermentation process. Once cool, transfer to your sanitized container for storage in the fridge up to 5 days.
Serve warm or cold. Garnish with grated ginger if desired.

Ingredients.Name: Burger fixings, like buns, lettuce, tomato, onions, etc.

Preparation.Step: Combine the lentils and water in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and let that all simmer until the lentils are soft and musy and the water is mostly gone, about 10 minutes. Drain away any extra water and let the lentils cool while you prep all the other ingredients.

Mash the white beans in a large bowl and then add add the lentils and the rest of the ingredients (not counting the cooking spray and fixings). If you find the mixture too wet to hold its shape, add some more breadcrumbs. Shape that mix into patties (you know, burger size) and put them on an oiled baking sheet. Chill that in the fridge, covered, for at least 30 minutes or up to 4 hours.

30 mins
Crank your oven to 400°F when you're ready to go. Coat the patties lightly with some cooking spray and bake them for about 30 minutes, flipping them over halfway. You want them to be golden on both sides. Serve them up with whatever the you like on a burger and then go to town.

Recipes.name: Spiced Chickpea Wraps w/ Tahini Dressing

Preparation.Step: Mix all Tahini Dressing ingredients together in a small glass until it is smooth and creamy. Set it in the fridge.

Now get the chickpeas going. Heat up the olive oil in a large skillet or work over mdeium-high heat. Add the chickpeas and fry them until they start to turn gold and pop around a bit. This will take 3 to 5 minutes. In a small glass, mix together the lemon juice, maple syrup, and soy sauce. When the chickpeas are looking right, pour the lemon juice mixture over them and stir. Let that shit evaporate for about 30 seconds and then add all the spices. Stir and let them all fry together for another 30 seconds and then turn off the heat.

20 mins
Serve these in a wrap with some spinach leaves and thinly sliced carrot and cucumber sticks. Drizzle some dressing over it and wrap it up.

Ingredients.Name: Salted Butter, Salted is important, this is where you get your salt for your buns from in this case.
Bread Flour, All-Purpose Flour will work fine, they'll just be a little crumbly.

Preparation.Step:
10 secs
Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water.

5 mins
Let stand. Should become 'frothy', letting you know your yeast is alive and well.

30 secs
Add butter, mix well. Allow butter to fully melt before continuing.

2 mins
Add egg and about 1/3 of the flour. Mix into a smooth paste.

10 mins
Add most of the remaining flour. Knead till a smooth, taught ball can be formed. Add more flour as needed to render dough not sticky.

5 mins
Split into 8 equal pieces, and roll into taught balls. Place seam side down on baking sheet.
Preheat oven to 220c (425F).

30 mins
Cover with a tea towel and let rest.

12 mins
Bake uncovered for 10-12 minutes till golden brown on top.

30 secs
optional
Brush tops with melted butter as soon as they come out of the oven.

20 mins
Allow to rest and cool completely.
preheat oven to 350 degrees
Grease 2 9" round cake pans / dust with flour / tap out excess

2 mins
in a large bowl, beat together butter and sugar with an electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy

2 mins
Add eggs and vanilla and beat until well blended

2 mins
Add chocolate and beat 1-2 minutes

2 mins
Mix flour, baking soda and salt. Add to chocolate mixture in two additions, alternating with buttermilk.

3 mins
Beat until well blended

3 mins
With mixer on low speed, add boiling water and beat until smooth (batter will be thin)
Pour batter into prepared pans

40 mins
Bake 35-40 minutes until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean)

15 mins
Let cool in pans 10-15 minutes
remove from pans and let cool completely
Frost
in a small mixing bowl, sift together sugar and cocoa
add butter milk and vanilla

5 mins
stir until smooth and glossy do not use mixer

3 mins
In a small mixing bowl, combine sugar, butter, chocolate and vanilla until well mixed
Gradually add milk until light and fluffy

Ingredients.Name: chicken thighs, cut into small-medium sized pieces
green onions, can substitute with regular onions

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Mix gochujang, honey, sesame oil, chopped garlic cloves, grated ginger, rice vinegar (and optionally soy sauce and water) into a bowl.
Mix chicken into the bowl and let it marinate (preferably overnight).

5 mins
Set a pan to high heat and add canola oil.

Cut the green onions in half. Chop the white half of the green onions and add them to the pan once it's hot. The green half of the green onions will be used later as a garnish once the chicken is cooked. If substituting green onions with regular onions, add all of it to the pan now.
Add the marinated chicken to the pan. Stir frequently and add salt to taste. Additional gochujang can also be added at this point.
Take off the heat once chicken is fully cooked and sauce reaches desired consistency.
Garnish with green half of the green onions.

15 mins
Wash rice and soak for 15 minutes in plenty of cold water. You should be able to easily break a grain of rice by placing between your thumb and index finger. Drain well.

15 mins
Heat 3 tbsp olive oil in a large sauce pan with a tight sealing lid until oil is shimmering but not smoking. Add onions and cook 3 to 4 minutes until translucent. Add garlic and orzo pasta. Toss until the orzo has gained some color then stir in the rice. Toss to coat.

20 mins
Add lemon juice and broth. Bring liquid to a rolling boil then turn heat to low. Cover and cook for 20 minutes or until rice is done and liquid fully absorbed.

10 mins
Remove rice from heat. Let sit for about 10 minutes.
Uncover and stir in parsley, dill, and lemon zest. Garnish with lemon wedges.

Ingredients.Name: grapeseed oil, or similar neutral oil

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until creamy and smooth.

30 mins
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.
Brush the bell peppers with 1 tbsp of olive oil, and place in a lightly oiled oven-safe pan or cast-iron skillet. Roast the peppers in the oven for 30 minutes, turning over once or twice.

10 mins
Remove from the oven and place the peppers in a bowl. Cover with plastic wrap for a few minutes, trapping the steam and making them easy to peel. When cool enough to handle, simply peel the peppers, remove the seeds and slice the peppers into strips.

10 mins
Combine red pepper strips in bowl of food processor with 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, walnuts, tomato paste, bread crumbs, pomegranate molasses, Aleppo pepper, sugar, sumac, salt and cayenne. Blend into a smooth paste.
Transfer to a serving bowl and serve at room temperature. Top the dip with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, and garnish with a little more walnuts and fresh parsley.

Ingredients.Name: Vegetable Oil, or 1 cup Unsalted Butter
Filling of your Choice, Cheese, Spinach, Chilis, etc.

Preparation.Step:
30 mins
In a large pot, place the cornhusks and cover with hot water to soften them. Leave there for at least 30 minutes. Drain and reserve.

10 mins
In a large bowl, mix the dry ingredients, and stir in the vegetable oil. Pour the warm broth and mix with a spatula until you form the dough with a creamy texture, similar to soft ice cream. If the dough doesn’t look creamy enough, add a little more broth, a tablespoon at the time.

20 mins
Spread about 3 tablespoons of the dough on the corn husk using a spoon or spatula. Top with 2 tablespoons of the filling. Fold one left side of the husk to the center and then the right side to the center. Finally, fold the end toward the center of the tamal. Place the tamal on a tray while you finish assembling the rest.

5 mins
Now, get your steamer ready adding a couple of hot cups of water and line the steamer rack with corn husks.
Place the tamales standing up, cover with the rest of the corn husk, a clean dishtowel, and the pot lid.

1 hr
Cook for 60 minutes to 75 minutes over a medium heat. While cooking, add more hot water to the pot if needed, be careful with the steam while removing the lid. To make sure your tamales are done, remove one and if the corn husk can easily be removed from the dough they are ready. The tamales will firm up after cooked.

10 mins
In a small bowl whisk the water, sugar and yeast together. Let it sit for about 10 minutes. If the yeast is good, it will start to froth up.

5 mins
In the bowl of your mixer, add the flour and salt, olive oil and yeast mixture. Mix everything together using the dough hook for about 5 minutes or until the dough is soft and elastic. When it’s done it will come clean from the side of the bowl.

Shape the dough into a ball and place in an oiled bowl, rubbing oil on the dough as well, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate. If you’re not using the dough right away, you can also freeze the dough.
Bake pizza at 475 for 8 minutes

10 mins
Boil dates in water until soft

5 mins
Blend into puree

5 mins
Sift flour, salt, baking powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg together. Add date puree to bowl and mix.

30 mins
Make pancakes!
Serve with powdered sugar or honey

Recipes.name: Fried Egg Tofu with Eggplant & Mushroom

Ingredients.Name: Mushroom Sauce, aka Vegetarian Oyster Sauce

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Cut the egg tofu into 2 cm thick circular disks and lay flat on a paper towel for 5 minutes on each side. Pour cornstarch on a plate and dip each flat side of the egg tofu in cornstarch. Set aside.

15 mins
Cut eggplant into long strips and soak in salted water for 15 minutes. After 15 minutes, drain off water and pat eggplants dry using paper towel.

5 mins
To make the sauce mixture, combine soy sauce, mushroom sauce, vegetable broth, sesame oil, and 3/4 cup water in a bowl. Set aside.

2 mins
In a small bowl, combine 3/4 tablespoon of cornstarch with 3 tablespoons of water and mix well to make a cornstarch slurry. Set aside.

10 mins
Add about 1 tablespoon of oil on a pan and heat over medium high heat. Add the eggplants and stir fry for about 8-10 minutes or until soft and tender. Remove from heat and set aside.

15 mins
In a wok, heat up the 100ml of oil over medium heat. When it bubbles, add in the coated tofu to fry. Gently flip over a few times until golden color (about 3-4 mins). Fry the tofu in batches of 3-5. Do not overcrowd the wok. Transfer to a plate lined with kitchen towel to absorb the excess oil

5 mins
In a large pan, heat about 1 tablespoon of oil. Add the garlic and stir fry until fragrant and tender. Add in the mushrooms and cook for about 2-3 minutes. Add in the sauce mixture and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Pour in the cornstarch slurry and mix well. Bring the sauce to a boil and the sauce should be thicker and more consistent, but still runny. Mix in the eggplants and green onions and toss together gently until they are covered with the sauce.

3 mins
Arrange egg tofu on a plate and pour the stir fry over the egg tofu so the sauce is evenly distributed over the tofu. Serve with white rice.

Recipes.name: Gordon Ramsay's Tomato and Mushroom Risotto

Ingredients.Name: plum tomatoes, skinned, seeded and finely chopped

Preparation.Step:
55 mins
In a large saucepan sauté the shallots with the olive oil for about 3 to 4 minutes and then add the mushrooms and continue to sauté for another 5 minutes, stirring frequently until softened.
Stir in the rice and cook for another minute or two. Add the wine, stir and cook until absorbed. Pour in a quarter of the chicken broth, bring to a boil and cook until absorbed, stirring frequently.
Gradually stir in the rest of the broth over a period of about 15 minutes, adding more as each previous amount is absorbed. This helps to give you a creamy risotto.
When the rice is al dente, mix in the tomatoes and herbs. Check the seasoning and stir in the cheeses. Serve in warmed bowls topped with shaved aged Parmesan.

Ingredients.Name: hard-boiled eggs, cut into eight pieces, plus more for garnish
strips bacon, cooked and crumbled, plus more for garnish
crumbled blue cheese, plus more for garnish
cherry tomatoes, halved, plus more for garnish

Preparation.Step:
20 mins
In a small bowl, stir together mayonnaise, yogurt, and red wine vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.

In a large serving bowl, gently mix together eggs, bacon, avocado, blue cheese, and cherry tomatoes. Gradually fold in mayonnaise dressing, using only enough until ingredients are lightly coated, then season with salt and pepper. Garnish with chives and additional toppings.

Ingredients.Name: Canned Straw Mushroom, Strained and broken

How much of a texture difference would it be to run the ingredients through a food processor instead of a grinder?
Reply

I haven't tried it myself however it might be possible to use a processor. You will have to be careful not to let it run too long as the filling may become too mushy - possibly process them in small batches to achieve a more uniform consistency. It's important to maintain a coarse texture.
Reply

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Boil cabbage with dash of salt in small amount of water until soft. Set aside to cool, drain & squeeze liquid out.

5 mins
Sauté onion in butter. Add mushrooms & garlic into the pan. Add butter, salt, pepper & spices as needed and to taste. Set aside to cool.

15 mins
Set meat grinder to the coarsest setting. Grind the cabbage and drain excess liquid. Grind Sauerkraut and drain excess liquid. Grind Mushrooms but keep the liquid.

5 mins
To make the roux: melt 2 tablespoons of butter on low flame until just bubbly. SLOWLY, add 2 tablespoons of flour and let this cook, stirring very often, until the mixture turns light brown.

10 mins
Add mushrooms and the rest of the filling ingredients. Season to taste. Add some Farina or Cream of Wheat in the end to help bind the mixture. Let it cool to touch.

1 hr
Wrap and crimp in wonton skin and boil in lightly salted water. Cook for 1-2 minutes after they start to float.

15 mins
When you pull them out of the water, make sure they are well drained. To keep them separated on a dish, touch them with vegetable oil or sprinkle a touch of bread crumbs. If you do not do this, they will stick together. Never let the cooked pierogi sit in water. You can reheat them in oven, or microwave, or fry them.

Ingredients.Name: Potato Starch, 1/4 of the Volume of Potatoes

Preparation.Step:
15 mins
Cook the potatoes in boiling salted water, until tender.

6 hrs
Drain thoroughly and let cool for at least 6 hours then mash them.

5 mins
Press the mashed potatoes into a bowl and smooth the top. Draw two lines on the top of the potatoes, dividing the mass into fourths. Scoop out 1/4 of the potatoes and fill this space with potato starch, return the potatoes you just scooped out.

5 mins
Add egg and salt, stir until well combined.

15 mins
Roll a small amount of the mixture, about the size of a golf ball, in your hands until smooth. Make an indentation with your thumb and continue smoothing the dumpling.

10 mins
Prepare a large pot of barely simmering salted water. Without overcrowding the pot, place dumplings in water with a slotted spoon. They will rise to the top after a few minutes, if a stubborn one or two stay on the bottom, give them a gentle nudge, they may be stuck.

20 mins
Cook for 5 more minutes once they start to float, remove with a slotted spoon.
Top with with mushroom sauce to serve.

30 mins
Soak dates in soda water until cool.

10 mins
Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix shortening and sugar until well combined.

5 mins
Add eggs and mix until combined.

10 mins
Sift together flour, cocoa, and salt. Then slowly add to wet ingredients and mix until batter formed.

30 mins
Bake until knife comes out clean. Let cool, then wrap and let sit overnight.

10 mins
Mix all ingredients thoroughly

Ingredients.Name: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

Preparation.Step: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Put the tomatillos, onion and both chiles in a medium heavy saucepan, cover with water and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
Boil until the tomatillos turn an olive-green color, about 10 minutes. Drain and transfer the tomatillos, onions and chiles to a blender.
Add the garlic and cilantro and blend until smooth. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Mix the Mexican crema and heavy cream together in a small bowl and season with salt. Set aside.

2 mins
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a small skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the tortillas until golden but still pliable, about 10 seconds per side, using more oil if needed. Transfer to paper towels to drain.

Place the tortillas on a work surface. Divide the shredded chicken evenly among the tortillas and roll up each like a cigar. Spread 1/3 cup of the sauce in a 13-by-9-by-2-inch glass baking dish. Arrange the enchiladas in 1 layer, seam-side down, snugly inside the dish. Pour the rest of the sauce over the enchiladas. Drizzle the cream mixture on top and sprinkle the cheese all over.

30 mins
Bake until the cheese is melted and starting to brown in spots, about 30 minutes. Serve immediately.

Ingredients.Name: very cold butter, (8 Tablespoons or 1 stick of butter)

Preparation.Step: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.
Place parchment paper on the bottom of the 8x8 pan that hangs over the side of the pan. (This is to make it easier to remove the Strawberry Crumb Bars after cooking.)
In a medium bowl, stir together 1/2 cup white sugar, flour, baking powder and salt.

10 mins
Using a fork or a pastry cutter, cut the butter into the flour mixture. (VERY IMPORTANT: Make sure the butter is very cold.) Work with the dough until the pieces are very small. Dough will be crumbly. You can also pulse in a food processor to until you get pea sized crumbs.
In a separate measuring cup or small bowl, beat an egg with a fork.
Add the egg and vanilla to the flour mixture, and combine until you have a crumbly mixture.
Pat half of the dough evenly into the bottom of the prepared pan.

10 mins
In another bowl, stir together 1/3 cup sugar and cornstarch.
Stir in the strawberries.
Spoon the strawberry mixture evenly over the bottom crust.

5 mins
Crumble the remaining dough over the strawberry filling layer.

45 mins
Bake in a preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until top is slightly golden brown. (My oven runs hot and baked in about 38 minutes.)

30 mins
Cool completely before cutting into squares. I recommend refrigerating until ready to serve.

Ingredients.Name: Sichuan Pickled Mustard Greens (Sui Mi Ya Cai)

Preparation.Step:
2 mins
Combine the sauce ingredients in a small bowl and mix well. Set aside. Dry the green beans thoroughly before cooking to prevent oil splatter.

15 mins
Heat 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium high heat until hot. Add the green beans and stir to coat well with oil. Spread the beans to prevent them from overlapping, as much as possible. Flip every 15 seconds or so. Cook and stir until the surface is mostly brown and withered, 10 to 15 minutes. Turn to medium heat if the pan starts to smoke too much. Remove the pan from the stove. Transfer the green beans to a plate and set aside.

2 mins
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon oil and the Sichuan peppercorns to the pan. Cook over medium heat until the peppercorns turn dark. Scoop out and save for later.

5 mins
Add the tofu, Sichuan pickled mustard greens, and 1/4 teaspoon salt. When the surface of the tofu turns golden, add the dried chili pepper, garlic, and ginger. Stir a few seconds to release the fragrance. Add back the green beans and pour the sauce over them. Cook and stir until the sauce is mostly absorbed, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Serve hot on top of rice as a main, or as a side.

Ingredients.Name: Cans of cream of mushroom soup

Preparation.Step: Preheat oven to 350°F and spray a large glass pan.

20 mins
Mix soup and sour cream. Spread half the hashbrowns in the pan, then layer half the seasonings, half the sour cream mixture, and half the cheese. Repeat.

45 mins
Bake for 45 minutes.

10 mins
Let rest then enjoy!

Ingredients.Name: Shredded cheese, Cheddar or gouda or both

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Heat and stir :)

Ingredients.Name: Corn Starch, Slurried with some water

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Toast szechuan peppercorns in a hot dry skillet over medium heat, until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes. Crush.

5 mins
Place all ingredients in a medium bowl or small jar and whisk until well combined.
If using as a stir-fry sauce, and you would like to thicken it, whisk in 2 teaspoons cornstarch.
If using as a marinade, forgo the cornstarch and make sure to season what you are marinating with salt. The marinade alone will probably not be salty enough.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.

10 mins
Caramel: Heat sugar & water in a heavy bottom sauce pan. Stir occasionally until sugar liquefies and turns a medium amber color. Pour equal amounts into approximately 10 ramekins, swirling the ramekins while pouring to create an even coating on the bottom and slightly up the sides.

5 mins
Flan: Boil a kettle of water. Combine all the flan ingredients and whisk together until smooth. Pour the mixture in equal amounts into the ramekins.

50 mins
Place the ramekins in a baking pan. Fill the baking pan with the water from the kettle, surrounding the ramekins to about half way up the ramekins. Bake for 45 minutes then let cool before placing the flan in the fridge.

Ingredients.Name: Mushroom Sauce, May Sub Oyster Sauce

Preparation.Step:
20 mins
Sauce: Combine all of sauce ingredients. Use half the sauce to marinate the tofu for 20 minutes.

15 mins
Caramelized Onions: Heat the oil until shimmering. Reduce heat to medium. Add the onions and spread evenly over the pan in one layer. Allow bottoms to brown then stir. Repeat process for 15 minutes. Add salt and sugar at the 10 minute mark. Set aside.

2 mins
Toasted Cashews: Heat the oil then add cashews and cook for 1 minute or until lightly brown. Set aside

5 mins
Tofu: Heat the oil then add the garlic. Stir fry for 1 minute then add the marinated tofu. Cook for 2 more minutes then add in the toasted cashews & caramelized onions. Slowly pour in the remaining sauce, stirring constantly and cook for 1 more minute. Serve over rice.

5 mins
Heat 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Add cabbage & broccoli and cook, tossing often, until edges are browned, about 4 minutes. Reduce heat to low and continue to cook, tossing often, until thickest parts of cabbage leaves are tender, about 4 minutes longer. Remove from heat and set skillet aside.

5 mins
Place udon in a large heatproof bowl (or pot if you don’t have one) and cover with 6 cups boiling water. Let sit 1 minute, stirring to break up noodles, then drain in a colander. Transfer noodles back to bowl and toss with sesame oil. Transfer cabbage to bowl with noodles. Wipe out skillet.

5 mins
Heat remaining 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil in same skillet over medium-high and add tofu. Add chopped scallions (the pale parts), ginger, and red pepper. Continue to cook, tossing often, until scallions are softened and bottom of skillet has started to brown, about 1 minute. Add udon mixture, mirin, and soy sauce and cook, tossing constantly, until noodles are coated in sauce (be sure to scrape bottom of skillet to dissolve any browned bits), about 45 seconds. Remove from heat and fold in 1 Tbsp. sesame seeds and dark-green parts of scallions. Top with more sesame seeds before serving.

Ingredients.Name: Eggplant, cut crosswise into ¼-inch-thick slices
Fresh Basil Leaves, Torn, plus more for serving

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Position racks in middle and lower thirds of oven; preheat to 400°F. Coat 2 baking sheets and a 9-by-13-inch baking dish with olive oil.

10 mins
Whisk eggs and water in a shallow bowl. Mix breadcrumbs, 1/4 cup Parmesan and Italian seasoning in another shallow dish. Dip eggplant in the egg mixture, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture, gently pressing to adhere.

45 mins
Arrange the eggplant in a single layer on the prepared baking sheets. Generously spray both sides of the eggplant with cooking spray. Bake, flipping the eggplant and switching the pans between racks halfway, until the eggplant is tender and lightly browned, about 30 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

5 mins
Meanwhile, mix tomato sauce, basil, garlic and crushed red pepper in a medium bowl.

10 mins
Spread about 1/2 cup of the sauce in the prepared baking dish. Arrange half the eggplant slices over the sauce. Spoon 1 cup sauce over the eggplant and sprinkle with 1/4 cup Parmesan and 1/2 cup mozzarella. Top with the remaining eggplant, sauce and cheese.

30 mins
Bake until the sauce is bubbling and the top is golden, 20 to 30 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with more basil before serving, if desired.

5 mins
In a medium sauce pan combine the garlic, water, vinegar, sugar and salt.

15 mins
Heat to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar and salt. Once at a boil; add the sliced jalapenos pressing them so they are submerged under the pickling liquids. Remove the pot off of the heat and let them sit for 10-15 minutes.

5 mins
Use tongs to transfer the jalapenos into a clean jar. Ladle the pickling juices over top until you've reached the top of the jar. Let cool at room temperature before securing a lid and popping them into the fridge.

10 mins
Arrange all ingredients on top of the rice in a bowl to serve.

30 mins
Place an oven rack into middle position in oven and preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly oil an 8x8-inch baking dish.

Place 1 cup flour and butter in a mixing bowl and mash with the back of a spatula or wooden spoon until thoroughly combined. Mix in 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar, vanilla extract, and salt; mash mixture together until mixture looks like a slightly crumbly cookie dough.
Moisten your fingers with a little water and press dough into bottom of prepared baking dish. Use a fork to prick holes all over the crust.
Bake crust on center rack in the preheated oven until crust edges are barely golden brown, 22 minutes.
Beat eggs and egg yolks together in a bowl; whisk in white sugar and 2 tablespoons flour until smooth. Add lemon juice and lemon zest; whisk for 2 minutes. Pour lemon custard over crust.

25 mins
Bake on center rack until custard is set and top has a thin white sugary crust, 25 minutes. Let cool completely before cutting into bars. Dip knife into very hot water, run around the edge, and cut into 16 squares. Dust cookies with 1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar.

1 min
Melt butter in small saucepan over medium heat.

2 mins
Whisk in flour and cook for a minute or two until golden.

5 mins
Slowly pour beer in while whisking constantly so the mixture slightly thickens. Cook for 5 minutes while stirring.

5 mins
Reduce the heat to low and stir in the cheese and mustard until melted. Season with salt and pepper as desired.

3 mins
Pre-heat oven to 350 degrees.
In a medium mixing bowl, sift flour, baking soda and cream of tartar together. Whisk in salt.

5 mins
With a stand mixer using medium speed, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs at a low speed for 15 to 30 seconds (over-whipping the eggs could cause the cookies to expand too much during baking and then deflate).
Add vanilla and mix.

1 min
Add combined dry ingredients in 2 additions, mixing on low speed for 15 to 30 seconds after each, or until just combined.

10 mins
For sugar coating, combine sugar and cinnamon. Adjust sugar and cinnamon proportions to your preference.
Shape dough into balls (2 tablespoons each). Yields 24 cookies.
Roll cookie dough balls into sugar mixture until covered. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, 2 inches apart (2 baking sheets in total).

12 mins
Bake for 10-12 minutes then transfer cookies onto a rack to cool completely.

Ingredients.Name: 14.5 oz cans diced tomatoes, with the juice
carrots, finely diced, about one cup
small onion, finely diced, about one cup
ribs celery, finely diced, about one cup
half and half, or whole milk

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Add oil to a large soup pot over medium high heat. Once hot, add carrots, onions, and celery and sauté them for a few minutes.

25 mins
Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, chicken broth, oregano, and dried basil. Bring to a gentle boil and cook for several minutes, until the vegetables are tender.

Use an immersion blender or regular blender (you may need to do this in batches, depending on how big your blender is) to puree the soup until smooth. This step is optional. Return it to the soup pot.

10 mins
In a separate part, prepare the roux. Add butter to the pot over medium low heat and allow to melt. Stir in the flour and whisk together constantly for about 10 minutes or until the roux is a nice golden brown colour.

Add a big little full of the soup to the roux, it will start to form a thick paste. Add a few more big scoops of soup to the roux and stir well until smooth. Add the roux mixture to soup and stir to combine.
Stir in the Parmesan cheese, half and half, salt, pepper, and basil. Add additional oregano and basil if needed, to taste. Stir well. Cook for a few more minutes until warm through.
Store tomato basil soup covered in the refrigerator for up to one week.

Recipes.name: Classic Stroganoff for Today's Healthy Lifestyle

Ingredients.Name: boneless beef sirloin, or ground beef
instant beef bouillon or one cube dissolved in 2/3 cup hot water

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
In large skillet over medium heat, melt butter; add onion.
Cook 5 minutes or until tender.
Add beef, cook until tender.

Stir together bouillon, milk, flour, Worcestershire and mushrooms.
Add mixture to skillet.
Heat to a boil, reduce heat to low.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package instructions.

Stir sour cream into beef mixture, spoon over hot noodles.
Sprinkle with parsley, if desired.

Recipes.name: Roast Fish with Cannellini Beans and Green Olives

Ingredients.Name: whole skinless whitefish fillet, such as cod, haddock, or halibut
small shallots, thinly sliced into rings
Fresno chile, very thinly sliced into rings

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Preheat oven to 325°. Combine oregano, beans, olives, and ½ cup water (or 1/4 cup water, 1/4 cup wine) in a shallow 3-qt. baking dish; season lightly with salt.
Place fish on top and nestle into beans; season fish generously with salt. Scatter shallots and chile over fish and beans..
Very thinly slice 1 lemon and wriggle out seeds. Arrange slices, slightly overlapping, over surface of fish. Drizzle everything with oil

45 mins
Roast until fish is opaque throughout and flesh in the center flakes when gently pressed, 30–45 minutes, depending on the type and thickness of the fish.
Note: USDA temp for fish is 145, but you should take out the fish slightly under this temp

10 mins
Let rest, occasionally pressing beans down into the liquid so they don’t dry out, 5–10 min
Cut remaining lemon into wedges and serve alongside fish and beans for squeezing over.

Ingredients.Name: can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed

Preparation.Step:
7 mins
Add the olive oil to a large soup pot and place it over medium-high heat for two minutes. Add the onion. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

7 mins
Add the ground beef to the pot. Break it apart with a wooden spoon. Cook for 6-7 minutes, until the beef is browned, stirring occasionally.

5 mins
Add the chili powder, cumin, sugar, tomato paste, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and optional cayenne. Stir until well combined.

2 mins
Add the broth, diced tomatoes (with their juice), drained beans, and tomato sauce. Stir well.

25 mins
Bring the liquid to a low boil. Then, reduce the heat (low to medium-low) to gently simmer the chili, uncovered, for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally.

10 mins
Remove the pot from the heat. Let the chili rest for 5-10 minutes before serving.

Ingredients.Name: bunch roughly chopped flat-leaf parsley leaves and tender stems
bunch roughly chopped cilantro leaves and tender stems
extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for brushing
Kosher or sea salt and freshly ground black pepper

Preparation.Step:
1 hr, 10 mins
In a medium bowl, combine the onions, garlic, jalapeño, and red wine vinegar and let stand for 10 minutes. Stir in parsley, cilantro, and olive oil, season generously with salt and pepper, and let chimichurri stand for 1 hour.

Ingredients.Name: chicken breasts, cut to small chunks
heavy cream, sub w/ half & half or yogurt

Preparation.Step:
18 mins
Place rice in a sieve and rinse. Add to a medium pot with 1 cup of water and a big pinch of salt. Bring to boil, then reduce heat to low. Cook until rice is tender, 15 minutes. Remove from heat.

6 mins
Heat a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the oil, butter, and onions and cook onions down until lightly golden, about 4 minutes. Add ginger and garlic and let cook for 1 minute, stirring so it doesn’t burn.

6 mins
Add the chicken, tomato paste, and spices. Cook for 6 minutes or until everything is cooked through.

8 mins
Add the heavy cream and simmer for 8-10 minutes stirring occasionally.

Ingredients.Name: big tomato, as ripe and tasty as possible (not those round tasteless things but do your best...)

Preparation.Step:
1 hr
Step 1 : prepare the tomatoes. Preheat the oven to 180°C. Cut the tomatoes into 8 mm thick slices and lay them on a baking tray. Sprinkle the slices with salt and olive oil (and herbs and spices of your choice). Bake for an hour or until looking preserved.

10 mins
Step 2 : prepare the zucchini/bacon mix. Peel and dice the zucchini. Heat a pan with a dash of olive oil and add the bacon dices. Do not stir for a few minutes, until the bacon turns golden brown on one side. Add the zucchini and stir fry until the zucchini is cooked (it should become soft and translucent). Add salt and pepper to taste.

20 mins
Step 3 : par-bake the dough. Spread the dough on a pie dish and pick it with a fork. Cover the surface with some parchment paper, then some weight (I use clay balls). Par-bake at 180°C for 10 minutes. Then remove the weight and paper and bake for an additional 10 minutes.

5 mins
Step 4 : prepare the egg mixture. In a mixing bowl, combine the eggs, milk, liquid cream and 50 grams of grated cheese (leave the remaining 10 grams for later). Add salt and pepper to taste (but remember that some salt is already present in the zucchini/bacon mix and in the cheese).

5 mins
Step 5 : prepare the radish leaves. This one is simple : chop, rather finely, the radish leaves.

5 mins
Step 6 : assembling the quiche. When all the previous steps are done (tomatoes are preserved, zucchini and bacon are cooked, and dough is par-baked), spread some mustard on the par-baked dough. Lay the slices of preserved tomatoes. Cut the hard-boiled eggs in half and lay them cut-side down on the quiche. Distribute the zucchini-bacon mixture, chopped radish leaves. Pour in the egg mixture. Sprinkle the remaining 10 grams of grated cheese on top.

20 mins
Bake for about 20 minutes or until the surface is golden brown and a knife comes out clean (maybe slightly damp) from the center.

5 mins
Combine all the ingredients except the garnish in a cocktail shaker and dry shake (without ice) for at least 10 seconds to fully incorporate the egg white. Add ice and continue shaking until chilled and strain into a double old-fashioned glass wi ice. Garnish with the lemon zest and cocktail cherry.

10 mins
Heat olive oil in a heavy-bottomed skilled over medium heat. Add scallions, shallot, and garlic and heat until lightly brown. Add the spinach and cook until wilted and tender, about 4 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool.

5 mins
In a separate bowl, combine feta, ricotta, parmesan/kefalotyri, dill, parsley, nutmeg, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and eggs. Combine cheese mix with spinach, gently.

3 hrs
Remove phyllo from refrigerator and cover with a lightly damp kitchen towel. Take 1 phyllo sheet and place on a clean surface. Brush all over with melted butter, then top with another sheet of phyllo. Brush second sheet of phyllo all over with butter, then slice into 6 long, evenly sized strips (about 12"-x-3" each). Assemble spanakopita: Place a tablespoon of spinach mixture on the corner nearest you on one strip of phyllo. Fold corner over mixture to make a triangle, then continue folding (like a flag) until phyllo strip is completely folded over spinach mixture. Repeat until all filling and all phyllo is used.

23 mins
Place all folded triangles seam side down on prepared baking sheets and brush with butter. Bake until golden and crisp, 20 to 23 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.

Ingredients.Name: frozen artichoke hearts, sliced into eighths

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Cover bottom of casserole dish with olive oil. Layer artichokes in pan,. Sprinkle on salt, pepper, garlic, breadcrumbs, parsley. Layer artichokes again and repeat until finished. Top with breadcrumbs.

5 mins
Pour water carefully at side of dish until it almost reaches the top.

1 hr
Bake at 325 for one hour, or until tender.

1 hr, 10 mins
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Butter 2 (8-inch) round cake pans. Line with parchment paper, then butter and flour the pans.

For the cake: Beat the sugar, oil, and eggs together in the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with the paddle attachment until light yellow. Add the vanilla. In another bowl, sift together 2 1/2 cups flour, the cinnamon, baking soda, and salt.
Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients. Toss the raisins and cashews with 1 tablespoon flour. Fold in the carrots and pineapple. Add to the batter and mix well.
Divide the batter equally between the 2 pans. Bake for 55 to 60 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Allow the cakes to cool completely in the pans set over a wire rack.
For the frosting: melt butter in a pan, add brown sugar and boil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly, add coconut milk and stir until mixture boils
remove and add vanilla then cool
pour into mixing bowl and add powdered sugar a little bit at a time
beat well after each addition of powdered sugar

Assembling the Cake: Place 1 layer, flat-side up, on a flat plate or cake pedestal. With a knife or offset spatula, spread the top with frosting. Place the second layer on top, rounded side up, and spread the frosting evenly on the top and sides of the cake. Decorate with diced pineapple.

Ingredients.Name: 55% chocolate, cut into chip size pieces
unsalter butter, cold, cut into small piecdes

Preparation.Step:
15 mins
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
Sift flour and baking soda into a medium bowl. Stir in salt.
In a stand mixer, beat half the butter on medium speed until fairly smooth.
Add both sugars and the remaining butter until well combined. Then beat for a few minutes until the mixture is light and creamy.
Add eggs one at time, beating until the first one is incorporated before adding the next. Scrape down the sides as necessary.
Add the dry ingredients and mix on low-speed to combined.
Mix in the chocolate.
Remove the bowl from mixer and fold the dough with a spatula to evenly combine the chocolate. The dough can be refrigerated for up to 5 days or frozen for up to 2 weeks.

20 mins
Arrange 16 cookies on 2 pans. Bake for 12 minutes or until the tops are no longer shiny, switching the positions and rotating the pans halfway through.
Enjoy!

Recipes.name: Baci di Dama (recipe from Theresa Murphy)

Ingredients.Name: rice flour or all purpose flour

Preparation.Step:
30 mins
If required : toast and peel the hazelnut as follows. Lay the hazelnuts on a baking tray and bake them at 180°C for about 10 to 15 minutes, until the hazelnut start to turn golden and smell toasted. Get them out of the oven and check that the skin peels of easily (if not put them back into the oven). Then let them cool down for about 5 minutes (or until still warm but not burning hot). Pour them on a clean kitchen towel and rub the hazelnuts together until peeled.

5 mins
In a food processor, ground the hazelnuts until very fine, like the consistency of coarse polenta.

5 mins
Transfer the ground nuts to a mixing bowl and add the rice flour, cubed butter, sugar, salt. Mix with your hands until all ingredients are combined and you get a smooth dough that holds together. If not, knead until it does, or add a bit of liquid (water, milk, melted butter).

3 hrs
Divide the dough into three equal pieces and roll each piece into a cylinder of 2cm in diameter. Chill the dough logs in the fridge for a couple of hours, or in the freezer for 15 minutes.
Personally, I had to divide the dough into four pieces in order for them to fit in my fridge. Also, I used plastic wrap to shape each piece, because I found it helped a lot with the stickiness of the dough.

10 mins
Preheat the oven to 160°C and line two baking sheets with parchment paper. Working with on length of dough at a time (leaving the rest in the refrigerators), cut pieces of about 5 grams and roll them into balls that are placed on the baking tray, approx. 3 or more cm apart.

15 mins
Bake the cookies for 10 to 14 minutes, rotating the baking tray midway during cooking, until the cookies are lightly golden. Let the cookies cool completely.

10 mins
On a double boiler setup, melt the chocolate with the liquid cream. Put a chocolate chip-sized dollop of chocolate on the bottom of one cookie and take another cookie, and sandwich the two halves together. Proceed until all cookies are done.

Ingredients.Name: butternut squash lasagna, seeded, and cut into 1-inch cubes

Preparation.Step:
30 mins
Heat the oil in a heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the squash and toss to coat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Pour the water into the skillet and then cover and simmer over medium heat until the squash is tender, stirring occasionally, about 20 minutes. Cool slightly and then transfer the squash to a food processor. Optional: stir in amaretto cookies. Season the squash puree, to taste, with more salt and pepper.

10 mins
Melt the butter in a heavy medium-size saucepan over medium heat. Add the flour and whisk for 1 minute. Gradually whisk in the milk. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce thickens slightly, whisking often, about 5 minutes. Whisk in the nutmeg. Cool slightly. Transfer half of the sauce to a blender. Add the basil and blend until smooth. Return the basil sauce to the sauce in the pan and stir to blend. Season the sauce with salt and pepper, to taste.

5 mins
Position the rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 375 degrees F.

15 mins
Lightly butter a 13 by 9 by 2-inch glass baking dish. Spread 3/4 cup of the sauce over the prepared baking dish. Arrange 3 lasagna noodles on the bottom of the pan. Spread 1/3 of the squash puree over the noodles. Sprinkle with 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese. Drizzle 1/2 cup of sauce over the noodles. Repeat layering 3 more times.

1 hr
Tightly cover the baking dish with foil and bake the lasagna for 40 minutes. Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses over the lasagna. Continue baking uncovered until the sauce bubbles and the top is golden, 15 minutes longer. Let the lasagna stand for 15 minutes before serving.

Ingredients.Name: tl vanillepasta*, dit ingredient kan je naar smaak wijzigen naar wat je maar wil! optional

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Klop de slagroom stijf in een kom. Voeg hier de gecondenseerde melk en vanillepasta aan toe, spatel het rustig door elkaar tot een egaal mengsel.

5 mins
Giet het ijs dan in een afsluitbare bak, plaats de deksel erop en zet de bak minimaal 6 uur in de vriezer.

6 hrs
Dat is het, nu is het alleen nog wachten tot je ijs hard genoeg is. Haal het ijs 10-15 minuten voor serveren uit de vriezer zodat je er makkelijker bolletjes van kunt scheppen.

Recipes.name: Pumpkin Soup with Cran Apple Relish

Ingredients.Name: poultry seasoning, sub thyme if no poultry seasoning
crcrisp apple, such as McIntosh or Granny Smit, finely chopped

Preparation.Step:
10 mins
Heat a medium soup pot over medium to medium high heat. Add the oil and melt the butter. Add bay, celery, and onion. Season the veggies with salt and pepper. Cook 6 or 7 minutes, until tender.

15 mins
Add flour, poultry seasoning and hot sauce, to taste, then cook flour a minute. Whisk in vegetable stock and bring liquid to a bubble. Whisk in pumpkin in large spoonfuls to incorporate it into the broth. Simmer soup 10 minutes to thicken a bit then add in cream and nutmeg. Reduce heat to low and keep warm until ready to serve.

2 mins
While soup cooks, assemble the relish: combine apple, onion, lemon juice, cranberries, chili powder, honey and cinnamon.

2 mins
Adjust seasonings in soup and relish and serve soup in shallow bowls with a few spoonfuls of relish.

Ingredients.Name: all-purpose flour, 340 to 425 grams, or 2½ to 3 cups
vegetable shortening, 552 to 736 grams or 3 to 4 cups

Preparation.Step:
15 mins
Combine the 2.25 teaspoons yeast and 3/4 cup warm water in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a dough hook. Let stand for 10 minutes.

15 mins
Add the 66 grams sugar, .5 teaspoons salt, 57 grams butter, 1 egg, 1 egg yolk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and 2½ cups of the flour. Knead on low speed until a dough begins to form. If the dough is quite sticky, add more flour a tablespoon at a time until a soft, tacky dough forms. The dough should clear the sides of the bowl, but not the bottom.

2 hrs
Transfer the dough to a lightly oiled bowl, cover tightly with plastic wrap and place in a warm, draft-free spot for 2 hours.

8 hrs
Gently press to deflate the dough, wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 8 hours, or overnight.

1 hr, 30 mins
On a floured work surface, roll the dough out to a ½-inch thickness. Using a doughnut cutter (if you don’t have one, use one larger and one smaller round cutters) dipped in flour, cut out the doughnuts and place on a parchment-lined baking sheet. (You can roll any leftover dough scraps into balls for more doughnut holes.) Cover with a clean dish towel and allow to rest for 1 hour.

5 mins
Line a large rimmed baking sheet with a double layer of paper towels and place a wire cooling rack on top.

1 hr
When ready to fry, heat the vegetable shortening in a large cast iron skillet (or other wide, heavy-bottomed skillet or pot) to a maintained temperature of 360 to 370 degrees. Gently lower the doughnuts into the oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan (I cooked in three batches). Cook until golden brown, about 1 minute per side. Carefully remove the doughnuts from the oil and place on the cooling rack. Repeat until all of the doughnuts have been fried.

Recipes.name: Alton Brown's "The Chewy" Chocolate Chip Cookie

Preparation.Step: Melt the butter in a 2-quart saucepan. Set aside to cool slightly.
Sift together the flour, salt, and baking soda in a medium bowl; set aside.

2 mins
Beat together the melted butter and both sugars on medium speed for 2 minutes.

Meanwhile, whisk together the whole egg, egg yolk, milk, and vanilla extract in a measuring cup or small bowl. Reduce mixer speed to low and slowly add the egg mixture. Mix until thoroughly combined, about 30 seconds.

Gradually add the dry ingredients, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed. Once the flour mixture is incorporated, add the chocolate chips and mix briefly to evenly distribute them throughout the dough.

1 hr
Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat the oven to 375 F; place oven racks in the top third and bottom third of the oven.

15 mins
Scoop the dough into 1 1/2 ounce portions onto parchment lined half sheet pans, 6 cookies per sheet. Bake 2 sheets at a time for 15 minutes, rotating the pans halfway through.
Remove from the oven, slide the parchment with the cookies onto a cooling rack and wait at least 5 minutes before serving. Leftover cookies can be stored in an airtight container at room temperature.

2 mins
Mix

Ingredients.Name: Tablespoon Coconut Milk, (or 1 of those frozen large mounds)

Preparation.Step: LOWER HEAT BEFORE ADDING JEERU AND SEEDS!!!
Add jeera and mustard seeds to medium/lowered heat
Add red chillies and curry leaves, 1 minute
Add onions, once almost cooked, add garlic, ginger for 2-3 minutes
Add green chillies and spices: Salt, a little haldi, black pepper, dhana jeeru, red chilli powder. Do not add garam masala.
2 minutes later, add in tomatoes and cook gently.

10 mins
After 5-10 mins you may need water.
Coconut milk 5-10 mins before the end of cooking. Add more black pepper/salt if needed.
Do not add garam masala ideally. Flavours should be of vagar.
Preheat oven to 160 C

5 mins
Melt the butter and let cool a bit

5 mins
Mix together all the ingredients

2 mins
Spread in a thin layer on baking sheet. Approximately 3-5 mm
Sprinkle some salt on top

10 mins
Bake for 10 minutes

3 mins
Remove and score to desired size

40 mins
Return to oven and bake for about 30-50 minutes until golden brown and dried out.

Ingredients.Name: Quick puff pastry, or regular puff-pastry, either homemade or store-bought

Preparation.Step: Preheat the oven to 180°C

15 mins
Wash the apples and rhubarb, and dice them.

10 mins
Place the puff pastry in a 25-30 cm pie dish and prick it with a fork. Put some weight on top (such as clay balls, or beans) and par-bake the dough for 10 minutes at 180°C.

5 mins
Remove the weight and cook for an additional 5 minutes.

5 mins
While the dough is baking : pour 30 g of sugar in a pan and caramelize it on high heat : simply spread the sugar as evenly as possible on the pan and wait until it melts into an ambered color caramel.

10 mins
Add the butter and give a quick stir before adding in the diced apples and rhubarb. Cook until softened.

1 min
Pour the fruit mixture on the puff-pastry that was par-baked for 15 minutes.

2 mins
Prepare the custard filling. In a bowl, crack two eggs. Add the remaining sugar (50 grams), the liquid cream and the vanilla extract. Mix until combined. Pour the custard filling on the fruit mixture.

35 mins
Bake the tart for 35 minutes at 180°C.

Ingredients.Name: plain yogurt or light sour cream

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Combine the dill sauce ingredients and set aside.

10 mins
Drain the chickpeas.
Add them and mushrooms to a medium bowl with celery, onion, egg, salt and black pepper. Mash together.

10 mins
Form into 8 patties, pressing together so they hold. They will be delicate.

30 mins
Heat a large skillet and add the oil, cook until browned, about 5 minutes per side.
Serve with a dollop of sauce!

Recipes.name: Whole lemon bars (adapted from David Lebovitz)

Preparation.Step: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F)

5 mins
Add the dry ingredients (flour, sugar and salt) to a mixing bowl and mix. Then pour in the butter while mixing, and mix until just combined. The mixture should look coarse and crumbly but with no visible lump of flour.

2 mins
Pour the crust mixture into a 20 cm (8 inch) square pan, previously sprayed or buttered (or covered with aluminium foil as mentioned in the original recipe but I tend to avoid that since aluminium can migrate into acidic foods and cause potential health issues) and press it down into an as flat as possible layer.

25 mins
Bake the crust for 25 minutes.

10 mins
While the crust is baking, cut the lemon in half, remove the seeds and cut the lemon into chunks. I like to remove some of the pith to prevent the topping from being too bitter. To do that, separate the flesh from the skin (as if preparing supremes), squeeze the juice from any remaining flesh on the skin, then remove a layer of white pith from the skin (keep the skin and throw the pith away). It is ok if there is still some pith left.

5 mins
Blend the lemon chunks with half of the sugar until the lemon is completely broken up. Taste the blended mix and adjust the amount of sugar according to your taste (the balance of sweet and sour won't change much even after adding the remaining ingredients).

5 mins
Add the eggs, corn starch, pinch of salt to the lemon/sugar mix and blend. Add the melted butter and blend again until the mixture is almost smooth. Quoting DL : "A few tiny bits of lemon pieces are normal and encouraged."

20 mins
When the crust comes out of the oven, reduce the temperature to 150°C (300°F) and pour the lemon filling on top. Bake for 20 minutes or just until the filling stops jiggling and is barely set.
Remove from the oven and let cool completely. Cut the bars into squares or rectangles. Sift powdered sugar over the top just before serving, if desired.

5 mins
Mix everything in a blender. Alternately, just give it some health stirs.

Ingredients.Name: beef broth, ideally better than buillion "beef" broth. If not, use vegetable broth
baguette, sliced. other bread works too. ideally stale, or toasted

Preparation.Step:
25 mins
Melt the stick of butter in a large pot over medium/medium-low heat. Add the onions, garlic, bay leaves, thyme, and salt and pepper and cook until the onions are very soft and caramelized, about 25 minutes.

30 mins
Add the wine, bring to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer until the wine has evaporated and the onions are dry, about 5 minutes. Discard the bay leaves and thyme sprigs. Dust the onions with the flour and give them a stir. Turn the heat down to medium low so the flour doesn't burn, and cook for 10 minutes to cook out the raw flour taste. Now add the beef broth, bring the soup back to a simmer, and cook for 10 minutes. Season, to taste, with salt and pepper.

5 mins
When you're ready to eat, preheat the broiler. Ladle the soup into bowls, top each with 2 slices of bread and top with cheese. Put the bowls into the oven to toast the bread and melt the cheese.

Ingredients.Name: flavoring, vanilla, orange, almod or lemon

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Cream together shortening butter and granulated sugar. Add the molasses and eggs and whip until light and fluffy.

10 mins
Sift all of your dry ingredients into a large bowl then use a measuring cup to add the dry ingredients about a cup at a time.

1 hr
Separate the dough into three equal pieces then wrap in plastic wrap and chill for an hour or two.

1 hr
Roll out on floured parchment paper to about 1/4 an inch thick and cut into desired shapes.

5 hrs
Place the cut out cookies into the freezer until frozen solid, several hours.

1 hr
Bake at 325° for 10-15. Time will vary greatly depending on size. Let cool, then decorate with vanilla royal icing.

Ingredients.Name: pine nuts, sub walnuts if needed

Preparation.Step:
5 mins
Combine basil leaves, pine nuts or walnuts and garlic in a food processor and process until very finely minced.

5 mins
With the machine running slowly dribble in the oil and process until the mixture is smooth.

1 min
Add the cheese and process very briefly, just long enough to combine.

30 mins
Prep and chop all ingredients. Mis-en-place that shiz.

40 mins
